code: import http from"../http-common";var login=function login(email,password){return http.post("auth/signin",{email:email,password:password}).then(function(response){if(response.data.accessToken){localStorage.setItem("user",JSON.stringify(response.data));}console.log(response.data);return response.data;});};var changepassword=function changepassword(oldpassword,newpassword,email){return http.post("users/changepassword",{oldpassword:oldpassword,newpassword:newpassword,email:email}).then(function(response){console.log(response.data);return response.data;});};var fogetPassword=function fogetPassword(email){return http.post("forgot_password",{email:email}).then(function(response){console.log(response.data);return response.data;});};var resetPassword=function resetPassword(token,password){return http.post("reset_password",{token:token,password:password}).then(function(response){console.log(response.data);return response.data;});};var logout=function logout(){localStorage.removeItem("user");};var getCurrentUser=function getCurrentUser(){return JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("user"));};var AuthService={login:login,logout:logout,changepassword:changepassword,fogetPassword:fogetPassword,resetPassword:resetPassword,getCurrentUser:getCurrentUser};export default AuthService;
